title: I have completed the whole syllabus for the 10th class board exams 7 months prior to the exam. Would it be ideal for me to start doing class 11 physics? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have completed your 10th syllabus it's well and good and as you want to start for 11th class physics for it first just see the 10th science is a go means just like revision and then move to 11th physics and study it deeply don't just focus on learning develop a deeo understanding of it… If you find it beneficial follow me

yeah but give 20% of the total time ur studying to revision. Also, make 1–2 page short notes for every chapter in science. It really helps in revision. I also have my 10th boards next year and also start solving some references for class 10th in maths
